description:
cmd/go: fixes to gccgo support

* Use -fgo-pkgpath and -gccgopkgpath rather than -fgo-prefix
  and -gccgoprefix.
* Define GOPKGPATH when compiling .c or .s files for gccgo.
* Use -fgo-relative-import-path.
* Produce .o files for gccgo, not .[568] files.
* Pass -E when linking if using cgo.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=177c85fde9bb ***

cmd/go: fixes to gccgo support

* Use -fgo-pkgpath and -gccgopkgpath rather than -fgo-prefix
  and -gccgoprefix.
* Define GOPKGPATH when compiling .c or .s files for gccgo.
* Use -fgo-relative-import-path.
* Produce .o files for gccgo, not .[568] files.
* Pass -E when linking if using cgo.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6820064

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 6820064: cmd/go: fixes to gccgo support
